alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grant and northwestern Luna Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1014 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Separ, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Grant and northwestern Luna Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
